description.value:
Aura 5

While within the aura, enemies gain vulnerable 15 cold and vulnerable 15 fire.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Cold

Standard

Reach 3

+33 vs AC; 2d12+6 plus 2d12 cold damage (plus an extra 2d12 cold damage on a successful opportunity attack).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire

Standard

Reach 3

+33 vs AC; 1d12+6 damage plus 1d12 fire damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks. If the dragon hits a single target with both claws, it makes a bite attack against the same target

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Cold, Fire

Standard

Ranged 10

+31 vs Fortitude; 2d12+10 cold and fire damage, and the firelord slides the target 2 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Cold, Fire

Standard

Close blast 5

+31 vs Reflex; 5d10+10 cold and fire damage, and the target is knocked prone and blinded (save ends both).

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +31 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Zone

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When hit by a melee attack

The dragon's space and all adjacent squares become a zone of roiling steam that grants total concealment until the end of the dragon's next turn.
The white dragon firelord's elemental power overcomes the fire affinity of the City of Brass. The dragon's attacks with the cold keyword deal full damage.

system.biography:
HP 1048; Bloodied 524 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 30 cold, fire 		Init +19 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 42Fort 43Ref 40Will 40
Speed 8 (ice walk), fly 8 (hover), overland flight 12
Ability ScoresStr 28 (+23)
Con 30 (+24)		Dex 21 (+19)
Int 26 (+22)		Wis 20 (+19)
Cha 26 (+22)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Athletics +28, Intimidate +27Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 29 | Insight 29
